folder: Union St. & Scholes St., Brooklyn, NY
text:
1. 72-74 Union Ave., at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Scholes Street, as seen from South 3rd Street (shadowed). At the corner ts the Synagogue.
named Beth Ha-Knesseth Beth Yaakov Zvi.
August 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
.Union Ave., north from S.4th St., B'klyn.
Sept. 24, 1941
P.L. Sperr, photographer

Synagoquue
Union Ave., n.e. cor. S. 3rd St., B'klyn.
Sept. 24, 1941

Neg. No. A-838

folder: Union Ave. & 3rd St. S., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Union Avenue, east side, north from South 3rd, to Stagg Streets. No. 70 is the first frame house at the right; the low square building is P.S. No. 191; the 3-story structure on the left being the Department of Sanitation
Unit.No. 118.
August 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
